A directorie teaching the way to the truth in a briefe and plaine discourse against the heresies of this time Whereunto is added, a short treatise against adiaphorists, neuters, and such as say they may be saued in any sect or religion, and would make of many diuers sects one Church. Radford, John, 1561-1630.
[24], 608 p.
Printed with licence [by the English secret press], [England] : 1605.
Written by John Radford, whose name appears in the heading on [cross]2r. Identification of printer from STC. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
